dict.string:
Ingredients: 1. 1 lbs pizza dough, 1 cup pizza sauce, 2 cups baby spinach 2. 3 cups mozzarella cheese, ½ cup fresh red pepper, ½ cup red onion cut thinly 3. ½ cup halved tomatoes & olives
Recipe: 1. Preheat the oven and prepare dough 2. Spread pizza sauce over the dough, distribute the spinach on top of the sauce, and the cheese 3. Top the pizzas with pepper, red onion, tomatoes, olives 4. Bake pizzas individually on the top rack until the crust is golden. Serve

Ingredients:
1. ¼ cup of olive oil, 1 onion chopped, 2 carrots chopped, 4 garlic clove minced 2. 1 tsp curry powder & ½ tsp dried thyme,1 large can diced tomatoes 3. 1 cup brown or green lentils, 4 cups vegetable broth, 2 cups water, 1 tsp salt 4. Pinch of red pepper flakes, black pepper, 1 tbsp lemon juice
Recipe:
1. Warm the olive oil in pot, add the chopped onion and carrot and cook, 5 mins 2. Add the curry powder and thyme. Stir. Pour in the drained diced tomatoes and cook 3. Pour in the lentils and the water. Add 1 tsp salt & red pepper flakes with black pepper and cook 30 mins 4. Transfer 2 cups of the soup to a blender. and purée the soup until smooth. Pour the puréed soup back into the pot. 5. Add the chopped greens and cook for 5 more minutes, stir in 1 tbsp of lemon juice and serve

Ingredients:
1. 2 toasted pita - torn into bitesize. 2 tbsp extra-virgin olive oil, pinch of sea salt 2. ½ batch fresh mint dressing, fresh romaine lettuce, chopped, 1 large tomato, chopped, 3. 1 cup quartered of cucumber, 1 chopped red onion, ½ cup torn fresh mint leaves
Recipe:
1. Toast the pita in your oven for 8-12 minutes until golden and crispy 2. In a large bowl, combine the chopped lettuce, tomatoes, cucumber, onion, mint and toasted pita. 3. drizzle up to ½ cup dressing over the salad. Gently toss until all of the ingredients are lightly coated in dressing. Serve promptly.

Ingredients:
1. 3 tbsp olive oil, 1 onion & 6 garlic cloves chopped. 1 ½ tsp fine sea salt. 2. 2 tsp paprika, 1 can diced tomatoes & chickpeas, 2 cups short-grain brown rice 3. 3 cups vegetable broth, 2 red peppers sliced, ½ cup Kalamata olives halved 4. Black pepper, ¼ cup chopped fresh parsley, 2 tbsp lemon juice, ½ cup frozen peas
Recipe:
1. Preheat the oven, heat 2 tbsp oil into pot, add onions & salt, 5 minutes 2. Stir in the garlic, paprika, tomatoes for 2 mins, then stir in rice until its coated and chickpeas 3. Increase the heat and bring mixture to boil. On baking combine the artichoke, peppers, chopped olives, 1 tablespoon of the olive oil, ½ teaspoon of the salt, and about 10 twists of freshly ground black pepper. Toss to combine, then spread the contents evenly across the pan. 4. Roast the vegetables on the upper rack until the artichokes and peppers are tender, about 40 to 45 minutes. remove and let vegetable cool. Serve

Ingredients:
1. Tacos - Olive oil, ½ red onion chopped, 1 clove garlic, minced , 1 small jalapeño 2. Salt and black pepper, 2 small zucchinis chopped, handful cherry tomatoes sliced 3. 1 can of black beans rinsed, 6 small corn tortillas, 3 radishes, sliced super thin 4. Avacodo sauce - 1 cup parsley, handful cilantro, 1 avocado sliced into chunks 5. 2 cloves garlic, 2 tbsp lime juice & 3 tbsp olive oil, 1 tbsp water. Salt and black pepper
Recipe:
1. First, make the chimichurri sauce. In a food processor, combine the parsley, cilantro, avocado, garlic and lime juice. 2. With the machine running, slowly stream in the olive oil and water. 3. In a large pan, add a drizzle of olive oil and onions until tender, Add the jalapeño, zucchini, yellow squash and a sprinkle of salt and black pepper. Cook for 5 minutes 4. Reduce the heat to low and add the cherry tomatoes and black-eyed peas, stirring until the mixture is heated. heat each tortilla on both sides then fill.
